com.here.android.mpa.search

Class TextAutoSuggestionRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.search.Request<java.util.List<AutoSuggest>>
      • com.here.android.mpa.search.TextAutoSuggestionRequest

  • public class TextAutoSuggestionRequest
extends Request<java.util.List<AutoSuggest>>
    Represents an extended Request used to retrieve a List of suggested search terms, instants results and refined search links by way of Places search services.

    A search location context must be provided by setting either a search center using TextAutoSuggestionRequest.setSearchCenter(GeoCoordinate) or a bounding map viewport using Request.setMapViewport(GeoBoundingBox). Failing to set a map viewport will result in an ErrorCode.INVALID_PARAMETER when executing the request.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  TextAutoSuggestionRequest.AutoSuggestFilterType
      Represents values describing AutoSuggest response's result filter types that can be used to filter the AutoSuggest response.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextAutoSuggestionRequest

        public TextAutoSuggestionRequest(java.lang.String partialTerm)
        Default constructor.

        Creates a request to return a list of suggested search terms, instants results and refined search links that are related to a specified location context and a partial search term.

        A search location context must be provided by setting either a search center using TextAutoSuggestionRequest.setSearchCenter(GeoCoordinate) or a bounding map viewport using Request.setMapViewport(GeoBoundingBox). Failing to set a map viewport will result in an ErrorCode.INVALID_PARAMETER when executing the request.

        Parameters:
        partialTerm - A partial search term used to create a list of suggested search terms.

    • Method Detail

      • setSearchCenter

        public TextAutoSuggestionRequest setSearchCenter(GeoCoordinate center)
        Sets the search center.

        Response items with AutoSuggest.Type.QUERY type are not bounded to this provided search center. If it is not needed to have such items in response, use TextAutoSuggestionRequest.setFilters(EnumSet) to exclude certain item types, TextAutoSuggestionRequest.AutoSuggestFilterType.QUERY in this case.

        Parameters:
        center - The GeoCoordinate representing the location context used to search for nearby places.
        Returns:
        The TextAutoSuggestionRequest.

      • setQueryText

        public TextAutoSuggestionRequest setQueryText(java.lang.String partialTerm)
        Set the query partial search term.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • setCollectionSize

        public TextAutoSuggestionRequest setCollectionSize(int value)
        Sets a collection size to be used for request responses. The maximum number of result items in each collection will be limited to this value. The valid value range is [1..100]. The default collection size is 20.
        Overrides:
        setCollectionSize in class Request<java.util.List<AutoSuggest>>
        Parameters:
        value - Desired response collection size per request.
        Returns:
        This Request object
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if size is out of range.
        See Also:
        SearchRequest, ExploreRequest, HereRequest, TextAutoSuggestionRequest

      • setMapViewport

        public TextAutoSuggestionRequest setMapViewport(GeoBoundingBox mapViewport)
        The map viewport is a bounding box of the map area currently visible to the user. The viewport can act as an implicit location context in the absence of an explicit location context. To ensure you get the best results possible, you should always set a viewport if there is a map visible to the user.
        Overrides:
        setMapViewport in class Request<java.util.List<AutoSuggest>>
        Parameters:
        mapViewport - The bounding box of the map area currently visible.
        Returns:
        The updated Request object itself.
        See Also:
        SearchRequest, ExploreRequest, HereRequest, TextAutoSuggestionRequest
